title: Provedor da Fazenda dos Defuntos e Ausentes
original_title: Provedor da Fazenda dos Defuntos e Ausentes
body: There used to be this position in Funchal, and the magistrate José Caetano de Paiva Pereira, appointed in 1804, was the last administrator whose appointment is recorded in the Municipal Council's books.

José Caetano de Paiva Pereira: Last administrator of the Fazenda dos Defuntos e Ausentes in Funchal

1804: Appointment of José Caetano de Paiva Pereira as administrator of the Fazenda dos Defuntos e Ausentes
